note.p: Education: Magdalen College, Oxford; Lincoln College, Oxford. BA

Career: Went to Dublin with Charles Abbot (FRS 1793) (1801); returned to London as Abbot's secretary and prepared the first Census Act; 2nd Clerk Assistant at the table of the House of Commons (1814); Clerk Assistant (!814-1840); prepared annual abstracts of poor law returns (1816-1836); died of a throat infection
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1840 No 45 pp 261-262
